subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain, almost an instant star when he arrived at Yankee Stadium in 2007 and who now hears mostly boos, has found comfort in the fact that he is still living out a dream.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain, almost an instant star when he arrived at Yankee Stadium in 2007 and who now hears mostly boos, has found comfort in the fact that he is still living out a dream.
